capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's lineage is a bit of a mix between being a pure-blood wizard and having some non-magical heritage. I think it's pretty clear that his parents, James and Lily Potter, were both wizards themselves, but they also had a connection to the Muggle world through their father's side.

So, I was reading about Harry's family history and it's really interesting. Apparently, his parents were both wizards, but they had a bit of a complicated past with the wizarding world. His mom, Lily, was a witch who was part of the Order of the Phoenix during the First Wizarding War, while his dad, James, was a member of Gryffindor House at Hogwarts and later became an Auror. But what's really cool is that Harry himself has this mixed heritage as a wizard - he gets to experience both the magical world and the non-magical one, which I think is pretty unique.
